infos.value: The Farplane is full of mysterious things and events to discover. Let's pay it a visit.
First, I shall explain about the events found here.
Various warriors and equipment will appear during Limited Events.
Many events have a decided duration and number of times you may attempt them per day. We must give our all in order to acquire the spoils of these events.
There are both <color=#00ffff>Limited Events</color> and <color=#00ffff>Daily & Training Events</color>.

• Limited Events •
Special events are held for limited durations. You can acquire exclusive rewards at these events.

• Daily & Training Events •
You can acquire the essential items for developing units, equipment, vision cards, espers, and more.

• Farplane •
Exploring the Farplane will earn you the essential items for developing units, equipment, vision cards, espers, and more.
Proceed to a tutorial on Event Quests?
